items.sentence: I wasn't surprised when Tom told me what he was planning on doing.
I wonder how much it would cost to rent a rowboat for three hours.
For a while, I was really addicted to cola and drank it every day.
Seriously though, episode 21 made me laugh so hard I almost cried.
It's said that the Vikings discovered America before Columbus did.
My older sister gave me an iPhone, but I don't know how to use it.
My younger brother used to often stay up all night reading novels.
You're supposed to always pay your rent on the first of the month.
I was surprised when Tom told me that Mary didn't want to do that.
I wasn't surprised when Tom told me that I didn't need to do that.
